greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^(p-1) if e >= p, otherwise a(p^e) = p^e.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^(p-1) if e >= p, otherwise a(p^e) = p^e.
program: (PARI) A327937(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for(k=1, #f~, if(f[k,2]>=f[k,1], f[k,2] = f[k,1]-1)); factorback(f); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 01 2019
